pageContext.claim: “Just today, we announced our new affordable clean energy proposal that will help our coal-fired power plants and save consumers, you, me, everybody, billions and billions of dollars.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump's proposal will save the power sector $400 million per year, the Post reported. Plus, "clean energy" might be a stretch. The plan is a big effort from the administration to bolster the coal industry, but it comes with substantial risk. The Post reports it "could slow the decline of U.S. carbon emissions and lead to hundreds more premature deaths and thousands of asthma attacks and missed school days."
